languages.text: Ульфар желает поговорить с Торбальдом Железношкурым о судьбе своей стаи прежде, чем начнется штурм Ефрата-II. Если Вольный Торговец позволит ему, он пригласит вожака Грозовых укусов на корабль для беседы.

Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.
languages.original_text: Ульфар желает поговорить с Торбальдом Железношкурым о судьбе своей стаи прежде, чем начнется штурм Ефрата-II. Если Вольный Торговец позволит ему, он пригласит вожака Грозовых укусов на корабль для беседы.

Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

languages.text: Ulfar souhaite s'entretenir avec Thorbald Peau-de-Fer à propos du sort de sa meute avant le début de l'assaut sur Euphrate-II. Avec l'accord {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, il invitera le chef des Crocs de la tempête à le rejoindre sur le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar souhaite s'entretenir avec Thorbald Peau-de-Fer à propos du sort de sa meute avant le début de l'assaut sur Euphrate-II. Avec l'accord {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, il invitera le chef des Crocs de la tempête à le rejoindre sur le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius.

languages.text: 乌尔法希望能在进攻欧夫拉茨二号星之前，先和索巴德·铁皮谈谈他的狼群的命运。在行商浪人的许可下，他打算邀请噬风者狼群的领袖来冯·瓦兰修斯家族的旗舰见面。
languages.original_text: Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法希望能在进攻欧夫拉茨二号星之前，先和索巴德·铁皮谈谈他的狼群的命运。在行商浪人的许可下，他打算邀请噬风者狼群的领袖来冯·瓦兰修斯家族的旗舰见面。

languages.text: ウルファーはユーフラテス・IIへの攻撃を開始する前に、トールバルド・アイアンハイドに自身の群れの運命について伝えたいことがあるという。自由開拓者の承認を得て、彼は嵐喰いのリーダーをフォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦に招き、会談を行う予定だ。
languages.original_text: Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーはユーフラテス・IIへの攻撃を開始する前に、トールバルド・アイアンハイドに自身の群れの運命について伝えたいことがあるという。自由開拓者の承認を得て、彼は嵐喰いのリーダーをフォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦に招き、会談を行う予定だ。

languages.text: Ulfar möchte mit Thorbald Eisenhaut über das Schicksal seines Rudels sprechen, bevor der Angriff auf Eufrates II beginnt. Mit Genehmigung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} lädt er den Anführer der Stormbiters zu einem Treffen auf das Valancius-Flaggschiff ein.
languages.original_text: Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar möchte mit Thorbald Eisenhaut über das Schicksal seines Rudels sprechen, bevor der Angriff auf Eufrates II beginnt. Mit Genehmigung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} lädt er den Anführer der Stormbiters zu einem Treffen auf das Valancius-Flaggschiff ein.

languages.text: Ulfar quiere hablar con Thorbald Piel de Hierro sobre el destino de su jauría antes de que empiece el asalto a Eufrates II. Con el beneplácito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, invitará al líder de los Muerdetormentas a la nave insignia von Valancius para una reunión.
languages.original_text: Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar quiere hablar con Thorbald Piel de Hierro sobre el destino de su jauría antes de que empiece el asalto a Eufrates II. Con el beneplácito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, invitará al líder de los Muerdetormentas a la nave insignia von Valancius para una reunión.

languages.text: Ulfar, Eufrates II taarruzu başlamadan önce Thorbald Demirpost ile sürüsünün kaderini konuşmak istiyor. Hür Tacir'in onayıyla Borayutanlar'ın liderini bir buluşma için von Valancius sancak gemisine davet edecek.
languages.original_text: Ulfar wishes to speak to Thorbald Ironhide about the fate of his pack before the assault on Eufrates II commences. With the Rogue Trader's approval, he will invite the leader of the Stormbiters to the von Valancius flagship for a meeting.
